{{infobox character | people=[[Northmen|Northman]] | name=Bard II | image=Antonio José Manzanedo - Bard son of Brand.jpg | caption="Bard son of Brand" by [[:Category:Images by Antonio José Manzanedo|Antonio José Manzanedo]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles=[[King of Dale]] | position= | location=[[Dale]] | affiliation= | language=[[language of Dale]], [[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule=from {{TA|3019}} | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=[[Brand]] | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= |race=[[Man]] }} '''Bard II''' was the son of [[Brand]] and heir to the [[Kingdom of Dale]]. ==History== During the [[War of the Ring]] his father was slain in the [[Battle of Dale]], and Bard with many [[Men of Dale]] and [[Dwarves of Erebor]] were forced back to [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]] by [[Easterlings]]. There he was besieged with his ally [[Thorin Stonehelm|Thorin III Stonehelm]] for several days. When news came from the south of the destruction of [[Sauron]], Bard and Thorin emerged from the Lonely Mountain and broke the siege. Later he sent an ambassador to the crowning of King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] and thereafter his kingdom enjoyed the protection of the [[King of the West]].{{App|Great}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | GIR |GIR=[[Girion]]
